name: Express
description: The Chevrolet Express is a versatile van, known for its spacious interior and excellent cargo capacity, making it ideal for businesses and large families.

name: 300ZX
description: The Nissan 300ZX is an iconic sports car from the 90s, featuring a powerful design and exceptional engine performance, offering an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Quest
description: The Nissan Quest is an ideal minivan for families, offering a spacious interior and advanced safety features to ensure comfort on every journey.

name: LR3
description: The Land Rover LR3 is a luxurious SUV, known for its outstanding off-road capabilities and elegant design, perfect for adventurous expeditions.

name: MPV
description: The Mazda MPV is a versatile minivan, designed with a focus on space and flexibility, making it perfect for families who love long trips.

name: Crossfire Roadster
description: The Chrysler Crossfire Roadster is a convertible with a unique design, offering an exciting driving experience along with strong performance.

name: Corsica
description: The Chevrolet Corsica is a compact sedan with a simple design and stable performance, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a practical car.

name: Liberty
description: The Jeep Liberty is a compact SUV with excellent off-road capabilities and a robust design, ideal for those who love exploration and conquering any terrain.

name: Ram 50
description: The Dodge Ram 50 is a compact truck, known for its flexible transportation capabilities and reliable engine power, suitable for both work and daily use.

name: Cayman
description: The Porsche Cayman is a sports coupe with a refined design and exceptional engine performance, providing an inspiring and stylish driving experience.
